name: layerContext
signature: Layer<HttpPlatform | FileSystem | Generator | Path, never, never>
description:
A Layer providing the `HttpPlatform`, `FileSystem`, `Etag.Generator`, and `Path`
services. The `FileSystem` service is a no-op implementation, so this layer is only
useful for platforms that have no file system.
documentation:
A Layer providing the `HttpPlatform`, `FileSystem`, `Etag.Generator`, and `Path`
services.

The `FileSystem` service is a no-op implementation, so this layer is only
useful for platforms that have no file system.
